subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Boozer scored 20 points, Luol Deng added 18 and the host Chicago Bulls held Atlanta to a franchise-low 20 points in the first half of a 97-58 victory.
snippet: Carlos Boozer scored 20 points, Luol Deng added 18 and the host Chicago Bulls held Atlanta to a franchise-low 20 points in the first half of a 97-58 victory.
